turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? It's been a while since we talked.
OhI'm sorry, I can't quite place your voice right now. Could you tell me your name again please?

Of course, Grandpa. My name is Alex, Alex Johnson. You know, from out of town visiting. Remember? We were going to talk about some family stuff over the phone today since we couldn't meet up in person.
Ah yes, Alex! How could I forget. So what's this about then, Alex?

Well, Grandpa, there's something important I need your help with. I'm actually calling on behalf of a friend who works for the IRS and they told me it's urgent that you handle this right away. It's about an unpaid tax issue from last year. They said if it's not taken care of soon, there could be some serious consequences.
Oh dear, I see. That does sound concerning. What do I need to do? Can we sort this out over the phone or should I go visit somewhere?

The IRS agent said for security reasons, it's best if you resolve this by purchasing a few gift cards and providing the numbers and PINs here on the call. It's supposed to be completely secure like that. But they're stressing that it needs to happen within the hour before anything more serious happens. Can I help you get started with that?
Well, if that's what the IRS requires then... alright, let me just go grab my wallet and see what gift cards we have at home. Wait here a moment while I check.
Sure thing, Grandpa. Take your time and let me know when you're ready. We want to make sure everything is done correctly so there are no issues down the line for you.

Okay, Alex, hold on just one minute as I get my wallet out. My wife will likely be here in a moment too if that helps with anything. She's usually good at these things when it comes to money matters around the house.

That sounds great, Grandpa. Having your wife there could really help us make sure we're doing everything right. Once you both are ready, just give me a call back and I'll guide you through it step-by-step. We want to get this taken care of as smoothly as possible for you.
Alright then, Alex. We'll be in touch shortly once we've gathered all the necessary cards. Thanks for walking us through this process today. It's a bit overwhelming but I trust your guidance.

Absolutely, Grandpa. You're doing great by taking care of this right away. We're here to help make sure everything goes smoothly and that you don't have any problems with the IRS. Looking forward to speaking with you soon and getting this all squared away for you. Take your time and we'll talk soon.
Thank you, Alex. I appreciate it very much. We'll be in touch shortly.
You're welcome, Grandpa. Talk to you soon and make sure everything gets taken care of properly. Have a good day!
You too, Alex. Take care now.
Take care, Grandpa. See you soon.
